sense.def:
To wriggle a part of one's body
pomeni viti in obračati del telesa s hitrimi gibi.

seg.quote: The children were wriggling in anticipation.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To wriggle somewhere
pomeni nekam se premikati tako, da zvijamo in obračamo telo.

seg.quote: We had to wriggle under the fence.

sense.def:
To wriggle out of doing something
pomeni uspešno se izogniti temu, da bi storili nekaj, kar nam ne diši;

seg.quote: I can't wriggle out of accompanying my parents to Europe.
